basic.description:
The nature of selected animal virus groups and their interactions with the host in disease production. Special emphasis on the pathogenesis of tumour and human immunodeficiency viruses. 
NOTE    Offered in alternate years to MICR 450/3.0.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (24L;12T;84P)
basic.subject: MICR
basic.title: Selected Topics in Viral Pathogen

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITES    (BIOL 205 with a minimum grade of A-) or (BHCM218 or MBIO 218 with a minimum grade of B-) and (Level 4 and reg in the LISC Major or Spec. Plan) and (a GPA of 2.5).
COREQUISITE    BCHM 310/6.0 or BCHM 315/3.0 or BIOL 334/3.0.
